trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Wanneer een service die is afgeleid van de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>klasse tegenkomt een uitzondering gegenereerd die kunnen worden verwerkt, kan worden aangeroepen de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>methode om te zien van de workflow runtime engine om te genereren voor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Geeft de service de <xref:System.Guid>van het workflowexemplaar en <xref:System.Exception>die zijn gekoppeld aan deze gebeurtenis in de aanroep naar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: De workflow runtime engine ingekapseld deze parameters in een ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs en verhoogt de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Uit binnen een abonnee de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>gebeurtenis, vindt u de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>eigenschap en de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A>eigenschap voor de informatie die is gekoppeld aan een bepaalde <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee haalt u de uitzondering die niet kan worden verwerkt door de service.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.Exception>die staat voor de uitzondering die niet kan worden verwerkt door de service.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref:System.Guid>van het workflowexemplaar gekoppeld aan de niet-verwerkte uitzondering.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstanceId is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstanceId is gelijk aan de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>van het workflowexemplaar gekoppeld aan de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Guid>van het workflowexemplaar gekoppeld aan de niet-verwerkte uitzondering.</xref:System.Guid>
